radiographic_examinations.findings: The liver is homogeneous in echotexture without focal lesions. There is no intra or extrahepatic biliary ductal dilatation. The gallbladder is distended, contains numerous gallstones and sludge. The gallbladder wall is thickened, measuring 1 cm. There is possible trace pericholecystic fluid. There is a nonmobile stone at the neck of the gallbladder. The common bile duct is not dilated, measuring 3 mm. There is a positive sonographic ___ sign. The pancreatic head and body are within normal limits. Portions of the pancreatic tail are obscured by overlying bowel gas. The spleen measures 10.4 cm, and has normal echogenicity. Limited views of the kidneys are unremarkable. The right kidney measures 11.9 cm. Limited views of the aorta and IVC are unremarkable.
